news.title: Ultra-short X-ray pulses explore the nano world

news.title: Measuring the temporal structure of fewfemtosecond freeelectron laser Xray pulses directly in the time domain
news.summary: Using a spectroscopy streaking technique at LCLS Linac Coherent Light Source researchers demonstrate temporal characterization of Xray pulses with subfemtosecond resolution.
